title: Sangean Portable Bluetooth Water Resistant Ultra Rugged AM/FM Radio Receiver with Large Easy to Read Backlit LCD Display
features: AM/FM Radio - A built-in digital FM/AM Stereo Tuner with 10 station preset memory lets you choose from a wide variety of radio, talk and music programming
Water, Dust, and Shock Resistance - The Radio has a rugged design that resists water, dust and shock making it perfect for outdoor job site conditions
Auxiliary Input - A 3.5mm Aux-in socket allows you to Connect external devices like your iPod, iPhone, MP3 or CD player or other portable digital music players
Built-In 5 inch Speaker - This advanced sound technology combines finely-tuned acoustic chambers and premium stereo drivers to deliver high-quality audio that you can truly appreciate
Dual AC/Rechargeable Battery Power - When the radio is plugged in via the AC power, it will charge your rechargeable C batteries
description: Sangean Compact Bluetooth Digital AM/FM Radio with Large Display

Sangean's new addition Compact-Size Utility Worksite AM/FM Digital PLL Radio Tuner includes leading-edge features offers best-inclass reception, durability, Rain/Dust/Shock Resistant, superior sound quality and convenience. It makes this radio suitable for both in and outdoor work not to mention its simple operation and made for tradesman who enjoys their music while at a job-site.
You can connect your favorite streaming device to the Sangean AM/FM radio with its Built-in Bluetooth Technology Version 4.1 Class II Wireless Audio Streaming to bring your device to life
A built-in digital FM/AM Stereo Tuner with 10 station preset memory lets you choose from a wide variety of radio, talk and music programming
An easy-to-read segment-style LCD screen is backlit to be easy to see even across the room and for night viewing

The radio from Sangean is an Ultra Rugged Digital Tuning Radio that is perfect for any jobsite, the beach, the lake, or anywhere you'd like to take it without the need to worry about it getting wet, it's rain resistant to JIS4 standard, it's also dust and shock resistant
This Radio Is submersible And Meets Waterproofing Standards That Are Equal To Marine radios
A 3.5mm Aux-in socket allows you to Connect external devices like your iPod, iPhone, MP3 or CD player or other portable digital music players
This advanced sound technology combines finely-tuned acoustic chambers and premium stereo drivers to deliver high-quality audio that you can truly appreciate
The radio can be powered with 4 rechargeable 'C' batteries that can be charged inside the radio with its built-in battery charger or the supplied power cord
